description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A fast moving, classic, arcade style, platform game - Jump and glide over 60 action packed levels.   Discover all ‘Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji’ as either ‘Magic Thighs’ or ‘Slightly Phil’ (One or two player - co-op) and save Japan from the nefarious Zodiac gang.
description.short: A fast moving, classic, arcade style, platform game - Jump and glide over 60 action packed levels.   Discover all ‘Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji’ as either ‘Magic Thighs’ or ‘Slightly Phil’ (One or two player - co-op) and save Japan from the nefarious Zodiac gang.
